cause.description:
Everyone should know the warning signs of a stroke. Every minute is essential to the recovery of the patient. Anyone can have a stroke. There is no age bracket. Recovery is possible in some cases, especially with rehabilitation, therapy and family support.
Act F.A.S.T!
F- Face - Ask the person to smile. Does one side of their face droop?
A- Arms - Ask the person to lift their arms. Does one arm drift downwards?
S- Speech - Ask the person to repeat a simple sentence. Are the words slurred? Can he/she repeat the sentence correctly?
T- Time - If the person shows any of these symptoms, time is important. Call 911 or get to the hospital fast. Brain cells are dying.
1. Everyone should know the 4 warning signs of strokes
cause.mission: Educate people on the warning signs of strokes, and to provide a support system to stroke survivors and their families.
cause.name: Stroke Awareness
